codeclass Solution {    public int climbStairs(int n) {        if(n == 1) {            return 1;        } else if(n == 2) {            return 2;        } else {            int[] array = new int[n+1];            array[1] = 1;            array[2] = 2;            for(int i =3;i<=n;i++) {                array[i] = array[i-1] + array[i-2];            }            return array[n];        }    }}

class Solution {    public int climbStairs(int n) {        if(n == 1) {            return 1;        } else if(n == 2) {            return 2;        } else {            int a = 1;            int b = 2;            int c = 0;            for(int i =3;i<=n;i++) {                c = a+b;                a = b;                b = c;            }            return c;        }    }}

codeclass Solution {    public int fib(int n) {        if(n == 0) {            return 0;        } else if (n == 1) {            return 1;        } else {            int pre = 0;            int order = 1;            int result = 0;            for(int i=2; i<= n; i++) {                result = pre + order;                pre = order;                order = result;            }             return result;        }           }}

codeclass Solution {    public int deleteAndEarn(int[] nums) {        int length = nums.length;        if(length == 0) {            return 0;        }        if(length == 1) {            return nums[0];        }                int maxValue = 0;        for(int num: nums) {            maxValue = Math.max(maxValue,num);        }        int[] count = new int[maxValue+1];        for(int num: nums) {            count[num]++;        }        int[] dp = new int[maxValue+1];        dp[0] = 0;        dp[1] = count[1]*1;        for(int i = 2; i<=maxValue; i++) {            dp[i] = Math.max(dp[i-1],dp[i-2]+i*count[i]);        }        return dp[maxValue];    }}

codeclass Solution {    public int uniquePaths(int m, int n) {        int[][] dp = new int[m][n];        for(int i=0; i<m;i++) {            dp[i][0] = 1;        }        for(int i=0; i<n;i++) {            dp[0][i] = 1;        }        for(int i = 1; i< m;i++) {            for(int j = 1; j< n; j++) {                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j]+dp[i][j-1];            }        }        return dp[m-1][n-1];    }}

class Solution {    public int uniquePaths(int m, int n) {        //ä¸€ç»´ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå…¶å¤§å°ä¸º n        int[] dp = new int[n];        Arrays.fill(dp, 1);        for(int i = 1; i < m; ++i) {            for(int j = 1; j < n; ++j) {                //ç­‰å¼å³è¾¹çš„ dp[j]æ˜¯ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡è®¡ç®—åçš„ï¼ŒåŠ ä¸Šå·¦è¾¹çš„dp[j-1]å³ä¸ºå½“å‰ç»“æœ                dp[j] = dp[j] + dp[j - 1];            }        }        return dp[n - 1];    }   }

codeclass Solution {    public int minPathSum(int[][] grid) {        int m = grid.length;        int n = grid[0].length;        int[] dp = new int[n];        dp[0] = grid[0][0];        for(int i=1;i<n;i++) {            dp[i]=dp[i-1]+grid[0][i];        }        for(int i=1;i<m;i++) { // è¡Œ            dp[0]+=grid[i][0];            for(int j=1;j<n;j++) { // åˆ—                dp[j] = Math.min(dp[j-1],dp[j])+grid[i][j];            }        }        return dp[n-1];    }}

class Solution {    public int uniquePathsWithObstacles(int[][] obstacleGrid) {        int m = obstacleGrid.length;        int n = obstacleGrid[0].length;        int break_m=0,break_n=0;        boolean flag = false;        int start = obstacleGrid[0][0];        for(int i = 0;i< n;i++) {            if(obstacleGrid[0][i] == 0) {                obstacleGrid[0][i] = 1;            } else {                break_n = i;                flag = true;            }            if(flag && i >= break_n) {                obstacleGrid[0][i] = 0;            }        }        obstacleGrid[0][0] = start;        flag = false;        for(int i = 0;i< m;i++) {            if(obstacleGrid[i][0] == 0) {                obstacleGrid[i][0] = 1;            } else {                break_m = i;                flag = true;            }            if(flag && i >= break_m) {                obstacleGrid[i][0] = 0;            }        }        for(int i=1;i<m;i++) {            for(int j = 1; j<n;j++) {                if (obstacleGrid[i][j] == 1) {                    obstacleGrid[i][j] = 0;                } else {                    obstacleGrid[i][j] = obstacleGrid[i-1][j] + obstacleGrid[i][j-1];                }            }        }        return obstacleGrid[m-1][n-1];    }}

class Solution {    public int uniquePathsWithObstacles(int[][] obstacleGrid) {        int m = obstacleGrid.length;        int n = obstacleGrid[0].length;        if (obstacleGrid[0][0] == 1) {            return 0;        }        obstacleGrid[0][0] = 1;        for(int i = 1;i< n;i++) {            if(obstacleGrid[0][i-1] == 1 && obstacleGrid[0][i] == 0) {               obstacleGrid[0][i] = 1;            } else {                 obstacleGrid[0][i] = 0;            }        }        for(int i = 1;i< m;i++) {            if(obstacleGrid[i-1][0] == 1 && obstacleGrid[i][0] == 0) {                obstacleGrid[i][0] = 1;            } else {                obstacleGrid[i][0] = 0;            }        }        for(int i=1;i<m;i++) {            for(int j = 1; j<n;j++) {                if (obstacleGrid[i][j] == 1) {                    obstacleGrid[i][j] = 0;                } else {                    obstacleGrid[i][j] = obstacleGrid[i-1][j] + obstacleGrid[i][j-1];                }            }        }        return obstacleGrid[m-1][n-1];    }}

public static int maxTriangle(int[][] triangle, int n) {	for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {		triangle[i][0] += triangle[i-1][0];	}	for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {		for (int j = 1; j < n; j++) {			triangle[i][j] += Math.max(triangle[i - 1][j], triangle[i - 1][j - 1]);		}	}	int res = 0;	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {		res = Math.max(triangle[n - 1][i], res);	}	return res;}

codeclass Solution {    public int minimumTotal(List<List<Integer>> triangle) {        if (triangle.size() != 1) {            for (int i = triangle.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) {                for (int j = 0; j < triangle.get(i).size(); j++) {                    triangle.get(i).set(j, triangle.get(i).get(j) + Math.min(triangle.get(i + 1).get(j), triangle.get(i+1).get(j + 1)));                }            }        }        return triangle.get(0).get(0);    }}

codeclass Solution {    public int longestCommonSubsequence(String text1, String text2) {        int lengthA = text1.length();        int lengthB = text2.length();        if(lengthB == 0 || lengthA == 0) {            return 0;        }        // dp[i][j] è¡¨ç¤ºå½“aé•¿åº¦ä¸ºiæ—¶ï¼Œbé•¿åº¦ä¸ºjæ—¶ï¼Œå…¬å…±å­åºåˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦        int[][] dp = new int[lengthA+1][lengthB+1];        dp[0][0] = 0;        dp[0][1] = 0;        dp[1][0] = 0;        for (int i = 1; i<= lengthA ;i++) {            for (int j = 1; j<=lengthB ; j++) {                /*                æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€éƒ½ç”±ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µå¾—åˆ°ï¼š                1.dp[i][j] ç”± dp[i-1[j-1]å¾—æ¥                2.dp[i][j] ç”± dp[i-1[j]å¾—æ¥                3.dp[i][j] ç”± dp[i][j-1]å¾—æ¥                 */                if (text1.charAt(i-1) == text2.charAt(j-1)) {                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1] +1;                } else {                    dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]);                }            }        }        return dp[lengthA][lengthB];    }}

codepublic static int maximumSubsegment(int[] nums) {    int length = nums.length;    if (length == 1) {        return nums[0];    }    // dp[i] è¡¨ç¤ºä»¥nums[i]ç»“å°¾çš„èƒ½å¾—åˆ°çš„æœ€å¤§å­æ®µå’Œ    int[] dp = new int[length];    dp[0] = nums[0];    for (int i = 1; i < length; i++) {        dp[i] = Math.max(dp[i-1]+nums[i],nums[i]);    }    int res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {        res = Math.max(res, dp[i]);    }    return res;}

//è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨topæ¥è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰çš„æ ˆé¡¶ä½ç½®ï¼Œå­˜çš„æ˜¯æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡}*ArrayStack;_Bool initStack(ArrayStack stack) {	stack->array = (elemType*) malloc(sizeof(elemType) * 10);	if (stack->array == NULL) {		return 0;	}	stack->capacity = INITCAPACITY; // è¿”å›æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ å¹¶topå‡ä¸€}elemType getPopStack(ArrayStack stack) {	return stack->array[stack->top]; }char Precede(char top, char new) { // è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ç”¨æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆé¡¶è¿ç®—ç¬¦ä¸æ–°çš„è¿ç®—ç¬¦çš„ä¼˜å…ˆçº§	if (top == '#') {		if (new == '#') { // è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯æ­£å¸¸çš„è¿ç®—ç¬¦å…³ç³»ä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äº â€˜#â€™ â€˜#â€™ çš„æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ç›´æ¥ç»“æŸäº†			return '=';		} else {			return '<';		}	} else if (top == '+' || top == '-') {		if (new == ')' || new == '+' || new == '-' || new == '#') {			return '>';		} else {			return '<';		}	} else if (top == '*' || top == '/') {		if (new == '(') {			return '<';		} else {			return '>';		}	} else if (top == '(') {		if (new == ')') {			return '=';		} else {			return '<';		}	} else if (top == ')') {		return '>';	} else {		return '\0';	}}elemType operate(elemType a, elemType b, char operator) { // æ­¤å‡½æ•°ç”¨æ¥è®¡ç®—æ•°å€¼	if (operator == '+') {		return a + b;	} else if (operator == '-') {		return a - b;	} else if (operator == '*') {		return a * b;	} else if (operator == '/') {		return a / b;	} else {		return 0;	}}elemType evaluateExpressionValue() {	struct Stack OPTR,OPND;	initStack(&OPTR); // è¿ç®—ç¬¦	pushStack(&OPTR, '#'); // é¦–å…ˆç»™opträ¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ª#ï¼Œå½“optrå°±å‰©ä¸€ä¸ª#æ—¶ï¼Œè¿ç®—ä¹Ÿå°±å®Œæˆäº†	initStack(&OPND); // è¿ç®—æ•°	int num = 0; // è¿™ä¸ªnumç”¨æ¥å‚¨å­˜æ¯æ¬¡ push ç»™ OPND çš„å€¼	char c = getchar();	while (true) {		if (c == '#') { // è¾“å…¥ä¸º # å·çš„æ—¶å€™æ­¤æ—¶æ•°å­—æ ˆé‡Œé¢å‰©ä¸‹ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°å­—ï¼ŒOPTRé‡Œé¢å‰©ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ª#å’Œä¸€ä¸ªè¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶åªéœ€è¦åœ¨è¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡è¿ç®—å³å¯			char operator = popStack(&OPTR);			int numA = popStack(&OPND);			int numB = popStack(&OPND);			int result = operate(numB, numA, operator);			printf("%d %c %d = %d\n", numB, operator, numA, result);			pushStack(&OPND, result);			break;		}else if (c - '0' >= 0 && c-'0' <=9) {			do {				num = num * 10 + (c - '0'); // å¯¹äºå¤§äº9çš„æ•°ä¼šè¢«åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦æ‰€ä»¥é‡‡ç”¨è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼è¾“å…¥å¤§äº9çš„æ•°å­—				c = getchar();			} while (c - '0' >= 0 && c - '0' <= 9);			pushStack(&OPND, num);			num = 0;		} else {			switch (Precede(getPopStack(&OPTR),c)) { // æ¯”è¾ƒæ ˆé¡¶è¿ç®—ç¬¦ä¸è¾“å…¥çš„è¿ç®—ç¬¦çš„å…³ç³»			case '<': // å°äºå…¥æ ˆ				pushStack(&OPTR, c);				c = getchar();				break;			case '=': // ç­‰äºæ—¶å€™å‡ºæ ˆä¸€ä¸ªè¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼Œåªæœ‰ '(' â€”â€” ')'çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰ç”¨çš„åˆ°				popStack(&OPTR);				c = getchar();				break;			case '>':				{					char operator = popStack(&OPTR);					int numA = popStack(&OPND);					int numB = popStack(&OPND);					int result = operate(numB, numA, operator);					printf("%d %c %d = %d\n", numB, operator, numA, result);					pushStack(&OPND, result);					break;				}			}		}	}	return getPopStack(&OPND);}int main() {	int result = evaluateExpressionValue();	printf("result = %d", result);	return 0;}
